Posts.Content: cupcake:  Hello.  I too am a metaplastic breast cancer survivor, and am sorry to hear about your mom.  Please join us at our MBC Facebook page, there are over 50 of us now, and I am sure some of them have the subtype you describe.  Here is the link to our page:  http://www.facebook.com/?ref=home#!/home.php?sk=group_124869 Judy
Posts.Title: metaplastic carcinoma of the breast
